001
002package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node;
003
004import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
005import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format.IPathFormatter;
006import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModule;
007import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ModuleScopeEnum;
008
009import java.net.URI;
010import java.util.List;
011import java.util.stream.Collectors;
012import java.util.stream.Stream;
013
014import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
015
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
017
018/**
019 * Supports querying of global definitions and associated instances in a
020 * Metaschema module by effective name.
021 * <p>
022 * All definitions in the {@link ModuleScopeEnum#INHERITED} scope. This allows
023 * the exported structure of the Metaschema module to be queried.
024 */
025public interface IModuleNodeItem extends IDocumentBasedNodeItem, IFeatureNoDataValuedItem {
026
027  /**
028   * The Metaschema module this item is based on.
029   *
030   * @return the Metaschema module
031   */
032  @NonNull
033  IModule getModule();
034
035  @Override
036  default URI getDocumentUri() {
037    return getModule().getLocation();
038  }
039
040  @Override
041  default NodeItemType getNodeItemType() {
042    return NodeItemType.METASCHEMA;
043  }
044
045  @Override
046  default IModuleNodeItem getNodeItem() {
047    return this;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Get the root items having the provided {@code name}.
052   *
053   * @param name
054   *          the root item's name to retrieve
055   * @return a list of matching root items
056   */
057  // TODO: delete
058  default List<? extends IRootAssemblyNodeItem> getRootNodeItemByName(@NonNull QName name) {
059    List<? extends IModelNodeItem<?, ?>> result = getModelItemsByName(name);
060    return result.stream().flatMap(item -> {
061      IRootAssemblyNodeItem retval = null;
062      if (item instanceof IRootAssemblyNodeItem) {
063        retval = (IRootAssemblyNodeItem) item;
064      }
065
066      return retval == null ? null : Stream.of(retval);
067    }).collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
068  }
069
070  @Override
071  default String format(@NonNull IPathFormatter formatter) {
072    return formatter.formatMetaschema(this);
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  default <CONTEXT, RESULT> RESULT accept(@NonNull INodeItemVisitor<CONTEXT, RESULT> visitor, CONTEXT context) {
077    return visitor.visitMetaschema(this, context);
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  default StaticContext getStaticContext() {
082    return getModule().getModuleStaticContext();
083  }
084}
